for_help: For help with election setup, troubleshooting, or platform questions, contact our support team:
ec_description: Everything you need to know as an Election Commissioner on the Neon Voting System.
voter_description: Everything you need to know about voting on the Neon Voting System.
neon_description: Neon Voting System is a secure, auditable, and multi-tenant digital election platform built for institutions, associations, and organizations that value transparency and trust.
ec_role_desc: As an EC, you are responsible for creating, configuring, and managing elections within your organization. Your work is reviewed by Super Admin before voting begins to ensure accuracy and fairness.
voter_role_desc: As a voter, you have the power to choose leaders and representatives through secure online voting. Your vote is private, secure, and can only be cast once per election.
ec_step1: Login - Use your Organization ID and EC password to access your dashboard
ec_step2: Set Up Election - Add positions, candidates, and voters for your election
ec_step3: Submit for Approval - When ready, submit your election to Super Admin for review
ec_step4: Make Corrections (if needed) - If your election is returned, fix issues and resubmit
ec_step5: Monitor Voting - Once approved, voting opens automatically and you can track turnout
ec_step6: View Results - After voting ends, review outcomes and declare results publicly
voter_step1: Receive your credentials (email, SMS, or WhatsApp) from your Election Commissioner
voter_step2: Login using your Organization ID and personal vote PIN
voter_step3: Review all positions and candidates carefully
voter_step4: Select your preferred candidates for each position
voter_step6: Submit your vote - you can only vote once
voter_step7: After voting, login again to view election results (up to 10 times)
ec_practice1: Double-check voter emails/phone numbers before submitting for approval
ec_practice2: Verify candidate names, positions, and photos are accurate
ec_practice3: Test your election setup before submitting
ec_practice4: Respond quickly if Super Admin returns your election for corrections
ec_practice5: Monitor voter turnout during the voting period
ec_practice6: Archive completed elections before starting a new one
voter_practice1: Keep your vote PIN confidential - do not share it with anyone
voter_practice2: Vote only once - multiple voting is not allowed
voter_practice3: Review all candidates before making your selection
voter_practice4: Ensure you vote for all positions (if required)
voter_practice5: Submit before the voting deadline ends
voter_practice6: Contact your EC immediately if you encounter any issues
feature_voters: Voters Tab - Add voters individually or in bulk (CSV/Excel)
feature_positions: Positions Tab - Define election positions and vote limits
feature_candidates: Candidates Tab - Add candidates with photos and taglines
feature_invites: Invites Tab - Send voter credentials via email, SMS, or WhatsApp
feature_outcomes: Outcomes Tab - View real-time results and declare winners
feature_settings: Settings Tab - Configure organization details and election type
feature_approval: Approval Tab - Submit elections and track approval status
security1: Your vote is encrypted and anonymous
security2: Results are only visible after the election ends
security3: No one can see how you voted, including Election Commissioners
security4: The system prevents duplicate votes automatically
security5: All votes are stored securely in the cloud
add_voters_to_start: Add voters to start your election
all_positions_must_have: All positions must have at least 1
monitor_sent_invitations: Monitor sent invitations, resend, and track engagement metrics
send_alerts_to_voters: Send alerts to voters about the election
define_start_end_times: Define start and end times for voting
all_requirements_must_be_met: All requirements must be met before submission
once_submitted_superadmin: Once submitted, a SuperAdmin will review your election setup. Voters cannot vote until approval is granted.
complete_remaining_requirements: Complete all {count} remaining requirements above before submitting. The system automatically checks when requirements are completed.
election_ready_for_submission: Your election is ready for submission. Click above to submit for SuperAdmin approval.
election_under_review: Your election is currently being reviewed by a SuperAdmin. You will be notified once a decision is made.
election_approved_voters_can_vote: Your election has been approved! Voters can now vote during the scheduled time.
search_admins: Search administrators by name, email, or role...
add_first_admin: Add your first administrator to manage system operations
password_requirement: Minimum 8 characters, include letters and numbers
invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
password_min_8: Password must be at least 8 characters
select_permissions: Please select at least one permission
email_exists: An administrator with this email already exists
confirm_delete_admin: Are you sure you want to delete administrator
name: Name
